description: Count of HCCs (0-108); includes unique HCCs or groups except add-on HCC 22
definition: HCC_CNT = SUM(HHS_HCC*, G*) - HHS_HCC022
if HHS_HCC002 = 1 then SEVERE = 1;
if HHS_HCC018 = 1 then TRANSPLANT = 1;
if SEVERE = 1 and HCC_CNT = 1 then SEVERE_HCC_COUNT1 = 1;
if SEVERE = 1 and HCC_CNT = 2 then SEVERE_HCC_COUNT2 = 1;
if SEVERE = 1 and HCC_CNT = 3 then SEVERE_HCC_COUNT3 = 1;
if SEVERE = 1 and HCC_CNT = 4 then SEVERE_HCC_COUNT4 = 1;
if SEVERE = 1 and HCC_CNT = 5 then SEVERE_HCC_COUNT5 = 1;
if SEVERE = 1 and HCC_CNT = 6 then SEVERE_HCC_COUNT6 = 1;
if SEVERE = 1 and HCC_CNT = 7 then SEVERE_HCC_COUNT7 = 1;
if SEVERE = 1 and HCC_CNT = 8 then SEVERE_HCC_COUNT8 = 1;
if SEVERE = 1 and HCC_CNT = 9 then SEVERE_HCC_COUNT9 = 1;
if SEVERE = 1 and HCC_CNT >= 10 then SEVERE_HCC_COUNT10PLUS = 1;
if TRANSPLANT = 1 and HCC_CNT = 4 then TRANSPLANT_HCC_COUNT4 = 1;
if TRANSPLANT = 1 and HCC_CNT = 5 then TRANSPLANT_HCC_COUNT5 = 1;
if TRANSPLANT = 1 and HCC_CNT = 6 then TRANSPLANT_HCC_COUNT6 = 1;
if TRANSPLANT = 1 and HCC_CNT = 7 then TRANSPLANT_HCC_COUNT7 = 1;

description: Transplant severe illness, 8 or more HCCs
definition: if TRANSPLANT = 1 and HCC_CNT >= 8 then TRANSPLANT_HCC_COUNT8PLUS = 1;

description: Enrollment Duration 1 month, at least one HCC (0/1)
definition: if ENROLDURATION = 1 and HCC_CNT > 0 then HCC_ED1 = 1;

description: Enrollment Duration 2 months, at least one HCC (0/1)
definition: if ENROLDURATION = 2 and HCC_CNT > 0 then HCC_ED2 = 1;

description: Enrollment Duration 3 months, at least one HCC (0/1)
definition: if ENROLDURATION = 3 and HCC_CNT > 0 then HCC_ED3 = 1;

description: Enrollment Duration 4 months, at least one HCC (0/1)
definition: if ENROLDURATION = 4 and HCC_CNT > 0 then HCC_ED4 = 1;

description: Enrollment Duration 5 months, at least one HCC (0/1)
definition: if ENROLDURATION = 5 and HCC_CNT > 0 then HCC_ED5 = 1;

description: Enrollment Duration 6 months, at least one HCC (0/1)
definition: if ENROLDURATION = 6 and HCC_CNT > 0 then HCC_ED6 = 1;
if any of the NDC or HCPCS codes corresponding to RXC_01 are present, then RXC_01=1;
if any of the NDC or HCPCS codes corresponding to RXC_02 are present, then RXC_02=1;
if any of the NDC or HCPCS codes corresponding to RXC_03 are present, then RXC_03=1;
if any of the NDC or HCPCS codes corresponding to RXC_04 are present, then RXC_04=1;
if any of the NDC or HCPCS codes corresponding to RXC_05 are present, then RXC_05=1;
if any of the NDC or HCPCS codes corresponding to RXC_06 are present, then RXC_06=1;

description: Anti-Diabetic Agents, Except Insulin and Metformin (0/1)
definition: if any of the NDC or HCPCS codes corresponding to RXC_07 are present, then RXC_07=1;
if any of the NDC or HCPCS codes corresponding to RXC_08 are present, then RXC_08=1;
if any of the NDC or HCPCS codes corresponding to RXC_09 are present, then RXC_09=1;
if any of the NDC or HCPCS codes corresponding to RXC_10 are present, then RXC_10=1;
if RXC_01 = 1 and HHS_HCC001 = 1 then RXC_01_X_HCC001 = 1;
if RXC_02 = 1 and (HHS_HCC037_1 = 1 or HHS_HCC036 = 1 or HHS_HCC035_2 = 1 or HHS_HCC035_1 = 1 or HHS_HCC034 = 1) then RXC_02_X_HCC037_1_036_035_2_035_1_034 = 1;
if RXC_03 = 1 and HHS_HCC142 = 1 then RXC_03_X_HCC142 = 1;
if RXC_04 = 1 and (HHS_HCC184 = 1 or HHS_HCC183 = 1 or HHS_HCC187 = 1 or HHS_HCC188 = 1) then RXC_04_X_HCC184_183_187_188 = 1;
if RXC_05 = 1 and (HHS_HCC048 = 1 or HHS_HCC041 = 1) then RXC_05_X_HCC048_041 = 1;
if RXC_06 = 1 and (HHS_HCC018 = 1 or HHS_HCC019 = 1 or HHS_HCC020 = 1 or HHS_HCC021 = 1) then RXC_06_X_HCC018_019_020_021 = 1;
if RXC_07 = 1 and (HHS_HCC018 = 1 or HHS_HCC019 = 1 or HHS_HCC020 = 1 or HHS_HCC021 = 1) then RXC_07_X_HCC018_019_020_021 = 1;
if RXC_08 = 1 and HHS_HCC118 = 1 then RXC_08_X_HCC118 = 1;
if RXC_09 = 1 and (HHS_HCC056 = 1 or HHS_HCC057 = 1) and (HHS_HCC048 = 1 or HHS_HCC041 = 1) then RXC_09_X_HCC056_057_AND_048_041 = 1;
if RXC_09 = 1 and HHS_HCC056 = 1 then RXC_09_X_HCC056 = 1;
if RXC_09 = 1 and HHS_HCC057 = 1 then RXC_09_X_HCC057 = 1;
if RXC_09 = 1 and (HHS_HCC048 = 1 or HHS_HCC041 = 1) then RXC_09_X_HCC048_041 = 1;
if RXC_10 = 1 and (HHS_HCC159 = 1 or HHS_HCC158 = 1) then RXC_10_X_HCC159_158 = 1;

description: Risk scores, one each for Platinum, Gold, Silver, Bronze, and Catastrophic levels
variable_used_in_risk_score_formula?: Risk score formula for each metal level
definition: Sum of (0/1 variable x Table 9 coefficient) over all of the following:
0/1 payment model HCCs,
0/1 age-sex categories for adult model,
0/1 HCC groups for adult model,
0/1 severe illness interaction groups for adult model,

continuation.definition: 0/1 enrollment duration monthly indicators for adult model,
Note that coefficients may differ by metal level but designation of 0/1 variables does not.

description: Cost sharing reduction (CSR) adjusted risk scores, one each for Platinum, Gold, Silver, Bronze, and Catastrophic levels
variable_used_in_risk_score_formula?: CSR adjusted risk score formula for each metal level
definition: if CSR_INDICATOR = 2 then CSR_ADJUSTED_SCORE_ADULT_GOLD = SCORE_ADULT_GOLD x 1.07;
else if CSR_INDICATOR = 3 then CSR_ADJUSTED_SCORE_ADULT_SILVER = SCORE_ADULT_SILVER x 1.12;
else if CSR_INDICATOR = 4 then CSR_ADJUSTED_SCORE_ADULT_BRONZE = SCORE_ADULT_BRONZE x 1.15;
else do;
CSR_ADJUSTED_SCORE_ADULT_PLATINUM = SCORE_ADULT_PLATINUM x 1.00;
SCORE_ADULT in { SCORE_ADULT_PLATINUM, SCORE_ADULT_GOLD, SCORE_ADULT_SILVER,

continuation.definition: SCORE_ADULT_BRONZE, SCORE_ADULT_CATASTROPHIC } depending on the enrollee's metal level

definition: CSR_ADJUSTED_SCORE_ADULT in { CSR_ADJUSTED_SCORE_ADULT_PLATINUM, CSR_ADJUSTED_SCORE_ADULT_GOLD,

continuation.definition: depending on the enrollee's metal level
